course_title: Support for Success in Math-181 Finite Math

sections.instructor: Murai, Lauren, Co-requisite: MATH-181 or Equiv. Note: This course provides students with support to be successful in MATH-181 Finite Mathematics. Studies show significantly improved success rates for students who enroll in a support course to accompany their transfer-level math course. This course is a co-requisite to MATH-181 and provides additional support for students who want to feel more confident in their math skills. Corequisite: MATH-181 or equivalent Note: Section 8154, a support course for MATH-181 students, is linked to MATH-181-8239. Students must enroll in both MATH-081-8154 and MATH-181-8239 in order to be eligible for this section. The combined classes meet on TTH from 6:00-8:05pm. Class meets on-campus as scheduled.

Corequisite: MATH-181 or equivalent Note: Section 6035 is part of the DVC PACE program. Students must be a PACE student to enroll.
